name: TelePuzzle
description:
Telepuzzle is a Platformer/Puzzle game where you can shoot ROT (Rays Of Teleportation) with your CUG (Cube Integrated Gun) to teleport from place to place
instantaneously!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

WAD - Jump Left Right
Alternative
Left Arrow Up arrow Right Arrow
Space - Jump

Click - Shot ROT

F11 - FullScreen
